original_text: It had a great, high wall with twelve gates, and with twelve angels at the gates. On the gates were written the names of the twelve tribes of Israel.
korean_text: 크고 높은 성곽이 있고 열두 문이 있는데 문에 열두 천사가 있고 그 문들 위에 이름을 썼으니 이스라엘 자손 열두 지파의 이름들이라

sentences.original_text: It had a great, high wall
and with twelve angels at the gates
On the gates were written the names
of the twelve tribes of Israel
